sentences.en: The inscription reads: "To Emma, with love from Harry."
sentences.cn: 题词是:“献给爱玛，爱你的哈里。”

sentences.en: Your wedding ring can be engraved with a personal inscription at no extra cost.
sentences.cn: 你的结婚戒指可以刻上个人题字不另收费。

sentences.en: The donor engraved the following inscription upon it.
sentences.cn: 捐献者在它上面刻下了如下铭文。
